docs.abstract: In this lesson, students learn about the dangers of overexposure to the sun, including melanoma. They then create public service announcements about other potential summer hazards and assess the effectiveness of such campaigns to inform the public.

byline.original: By PRISCILLA CHAN and YASMIN CHIN EISENHAUER

docs.lead_paragraph: Note: This lesson was originally published on an older version of The Learning Network; the link to the related Times article will take you to a page on the old site.
docs.snippet: In this lesson, students learn about the dangers of overexposure to the sun, including melanoma. They then create public service announcements about other potential summer hazards and assess the effectiveness of such campaigns to inform the public.
